meanings.definition: The quality or state of being thrifty; frugality in the expenditure of money or resources.
meanings.sent1: Her thriftiness helped her save money for a rainy day.
meanings.sent2: His thriftiness allowed him to buy a new bicycle without going into debt.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's thriftiness in collecting nuts for winter was truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: Grandma's thriftiness was like a shield against unnecessary spending.
meanings.sent5: The thriftiness of the ant in gathering food inspired the lazy grasshopper.

meanings.definition: The practice of using money and other resources carefully and not wastefully.
meanings.sent1: The family's thriftiness in reusing items reduced their household expenses.
meanings.sent2: Teaching children about thriftiness can help them become responsible adults.
meanings.sent3: The thriftiness of the cat in playing with a simple cardboard box amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her thriftiness with time was like a well-oiled machine, never wasting a minute.
meanings.sent5: The thriftiness of the farmer in using every part of the crop was truly admirable.
